languages.text:
Вы получили новое оборудование для корабля.
Откройте меню управления кораблем через сервисное меню {console_bind|RightBottom} и выберите новое оборудование. Для установки оборудования выберите желаемый отсек или предмет и нажмите {console_bind|Confirm}

You have received new equipment for your ship!
Open the voidship management screen from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom} and select the newly acquired component. To install the equipment, select the desired compartment or item and press {console_bind|Confirm}.
languages.original_text:
Вы получили новое оборудование для корабля.
Откройте меню управления кораблем через сервисное меню {console_bind|RightBottom} и выберите новое оборудование. Для установки оборудования выберите желаемый отсек или предмет и нажмите {console_bind|Confirm}

traits.locale_text:
You have received new equipment for your ship!
Open the voidship management screen from the service menu {console_bind|RightBottom} and select the newly acquired component. To instal the equipment, select the desired compartment or item and press {console_bind|Confirm}.

You have received new equipment for your ship!
Open the voidship management screen from the service menu {console_bind|RightBottom} and select the newly acquired component. To instal the equipment, select the desired compartment or item and press {console_bind|Confirm}.

You have received new equipment for your ship!
Open the voidship management screen from quick-access {console_bind|RightBottom} and select the newly acquired component. To install the equipment, select the desired compartment or item and press {console_bind|Confirm}.

You have received new equipment for your ship!
Open the voidship management screen from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom} and select the newly acquired component. To install the equipment, select the desired compartment or item and press {console_bind|Confirm}.

You have received new equipment for your ship!
Open the voidship management screen from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom} and select the newly acquired component. To install the equipment, select the desired compartment or item and press {console_bind|Confirm}.

languages.text:
¡Has recibido equipo nuevo para la nave!
Abre la ventana de gestión de la nave del vacío desde el acceso rápido {console_bind|RightBottom} y selecciona el componente que acabas de obtener. Para instalar el equipo, elige el compartimento u objeto deseado y pulsa {console_bind|Confirm}.
languages.original_text:
You have received new equipment for your ship!
Open the voidship management screen from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom} and select the newly acquired component. To install the equipment, select the desired compartment or item and press {console_bind|Confirm}.

traits.locale_text:
¡Has recibido equipo nuevo para la nave!
Abre la ventana de gestión de la nave del vacío desde el acceso rápido {console_bind|RightBottom} y selecciona el componente que acabas de obtener. Para instalar el equipo, elige el compartimento u objeto deseado y pulsa {console_bind|Confirm}.

languages.text:
船に新しい装備が追加された！
クイックアクセス{console_bind|RightBottom}からヴォイドシップ管理画面を開き、新しく取得した部品を選択する。装備を取り付けるには、希望の区画またはアイテムを選択し、{console_bind|Confirm}を押す。
languages.original_text:
You have received new equipment for your ship!
Open the voidship management screen from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom} and select the newly acquired component. To install the equipment, select the desired compartment or item and press {console_bind|Confirm}.

traits.locale_text:
船に新しい装備が追加された！
クイックアクセス{console_bind|RightBottom}からヴォイドシップ管理画面を開き、新しく取得した部品を選択する。装備を取り付けるには、希望の区画またはアイテムを選択し、{console_bind|Confirm}を押す。

languages.text:
您的舰船获得了新的装备！
您可以通过{console_bind|RightBottom}打开快速访问菜单，打开虚空舰管理界面，之后选择您刚刚获得的组件。若要安装新的装备，请选择需要安装的舱室或物品，之后按下{console_bind|Confirm}。
languages.original_text:
You have received new equipment for your ship!
Open the voidship management screen from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom} and select the newly acquired component. To install the equipment, select the desired compartment or item and press {console_bind|Confirm}.

traits.locale_text:
您的舰船获得了新的装备！
您可以通过{console_bind|RightBottom}打开快速访问菜单，打开虚空舰管理界面，之后选择您刚刚获得的组件。若要安装新的装备，请选择需要安装的舱室或物品，之后按下{console_bind|Confirm}。

languages.text:
Du hast neue Ausrüstung für dein Schiff erhalten!
Öffne den Raumschiffverwaltungs-Bildschirm über den Schnellzugriff {console_bind|RightBottom} und wähle die neu erhaltene Komponente aus. Um die Ausrüstung zu installieren, wähle die gewünschte Abteilung oder den Gegenstand aus und drücke {console_bind|Confirm}.
languages.original_text:
You have received new equipment for your ship!
Open the voidship management screen from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom} and select the newly acquired component. To install the equipment, select the desired compartment or item and press {console_bind|Confirm}.

traits.locale_text:
Du hast neue Ausrüstung für dein Schiff erhalten!
Öffne den Raumschiffverwaltungs-Bildschirm über den Schnellzugriff {console_bind|RightBottom} und wähle die neu erhaltene Komponente aus. Um die Ausrüstung zu installieren, wähle die gewünschte Abteilung oder den Gegenstand aus und drücke {console_bind|Confirm}.

languages.text:
Vous avez reçu un nouvel équipement pour votre vaisseau !
Ouvrez l'écran de gestion du vaisseau via l'accès rapide {console_bind|RightBottom} et sélectionnez ce nouveau composant. Pour installer l'équipement, sélectionnez le compartiment ou l'élément souhaité et appuyez sur {console_bind|Confirm}.
languages.original_text:
You have received new equipment for your ship!
Open the voidship management screen from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom} and select the newly acquired component. To install the equipment, select the desired compartment or item and press {console_bind|Confirm}.

traits.locale_text:
Vous avez reçu un nouvel équipement pour votre vaisseau !
Ouvrez l'écran de gestion du vaisseau à partir de l'accès rapide {console_bind|RightBottom} et sélectionnez ce nouveau composant. Pour installer l'équipement, sélectionnez le compartiment ou l'élément souhaité et appuyez sur {console_bind|Confirm}.

Vous avez reçu un nouvel équipement pour votre vaisseau !
Ouvrez l'écran de gestion du vaisseau à partir de l'accès rapide {console_bind|RightBottom} et sélectionnez ce nouveau composant. Pour installer l'équipement, sélectionnez le compartiment ou l'élément souhaité et appuyez sur {console_bind|Confirm}.

languages.text:
Gemin için yeni ekipman edindin!
Hızlı erişimden {console_bind|RightBottom} uçsuz gemisi yönetimi ekranını aç ve yeni edindiğin bileşeni seç. Ekipmanı kurmak için arzu ettiğin kompartımanı veya eşyayı seç ve {console_bind|Confirm} düğmesine bas.
languages.original_text:
You have received new equipment for your ship!
Open the voidship management screen from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom} and select the newly acquired component. To install the equipment, select the desired compartment or item and press {console_bind|Confirm}.
